displaytitle: Telegraphic Record of the Russo Japanese War: On the Ice of Lake Baikal in Russia, a Steam Locomotive and Its Cars Sank, Killing Tens of Officers and Soldiers. Russia’s Transport Capacity Was Greatly Damaged (Nichiro sensō denpō jikki no uchi: Rokoku no Baikaru-ko hyōjō tetsudō kikansha oyobi ressha suichū ni chinbotsu shite shōkō heishe sūjūnin sokushin su Rokoku yusōryoku wa ō-shōgai o uketaru mono nari 日露戦争電報実記之内 露国ノバイカル湖氷上鉄道汽関車及列車水中ニ沈没シテ将校兵士数十人即死ス露国輸送力ハ大障害ヲ受タルモノナリ)
medium: Woodblock print (ōban tate-e triptych); ink and color on paper
dimensions:
block (each): 35.6 x 24 cm
sheet (each): 35.6 x 25.4 cm. (14 x 10 in.)
creditline: Allen R. Adler, Class of 1967, Japanese Print Collection
markings: One red round seal under the artist’s signature: “Edokko” 江戸子

titles.title: Telegraphic Record of the Russo Japanese War: On the Ice of Lake Baikal in Russia, a Steam Locomotive and Its Cars Sank, Killing Tens of Officers and Soldiers. Russia’s Transport Capacity Was Greatly Damaged (Nichiro sensō denpō jikki no uchi: Rokoku no Baikaru-ko hyōjō tetsudō kikansha oyobi ressha suichū ni chinbotsu shite shōkō heishe sūjūnin sokushin su Rokoku yusōryoku wa ō-shōgai o uketaru mono nari 日露戦争電報実記之内 露国ノバイカル湖氷上鉄道汽関車及列車水中ニ沈没シテ将校兵士数十人即死ス露国輸送力ハ大障害ヲ受タルモノナリ)

makers.displaymaker: Published by Fukuda Kumajirō 福田熊次郎

texts.textentryhtml:
–2008 Collection of Ruth Leserman (Los Angeles, CA) and Allen R. Adler (New York, NY), co-ownership.
2008 Allen R. Adler (New York, NY), by gift to the Princeton University Art Museum, 2008.

displaymaker: Utagawa Kokunimasa 歌川小国政, 1874–1944 | Published by Fukuda Kumajirō 福田熊次郎
caption: Japanese, Meiji era (1868–1912), Utagawa Kokunimasa 歌川小国政 (1874–1944), Published by Fukuda Kumajirō 福田熊次郎, Telegraphic Record of the Russo Japanese War: On the Ice of Lake Baikal in Russia, a Steam Locomotive and Its Cars Sank, Killing Tens of Officers and Soldiers. Russia’s Transport Capacity Was Greatly Damaged (Nichiro sensō denpō jikki no uchi: Rokoku no Baikaru-ko hyōjō tetsudō kikansha oyobi ressha suichū ni chinbotsu shite shōkō heishe sūjūnin sokushin su Rokoku yusōryoku wa ō-shōgai o uketaru mono nari 日露戦争電報実記之内 露国ノバイカル湖氷上鉄道汽関車及列車水中ニ沈没シテ将校兵士数十人即死ス露国輸送力ハ大障害ヲ受タルモノナリ), 1904 [Meiji 37]. Woodblock print (ōban tate-e triptych); ink and color on paper; 35.6 x 25.4 cm (sheet). Allen R. Adler, Class of 1967, Japanese Print Collection (2008-148 a-c)
